outline.title: What Is This?
outline.summary: Introduction to the Triumvirate as a multi-agent AI coordination framework for safe scaling through role boundaries and auditable paths.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/r9VAcH26kW6o.webp - This image clearly depicts a 'Multi-Agent Architecture' which aligns perfectly with the 'Triumvirate Framework' being a multi-agent AI coordination framework.

outline.title: The Problem
outline.summary: Analysis of why autonomous AI systems fail: role blurring, lack of auditability, and unchecked autonomy escalation.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/1gHFuFpteOCb.png - This image shows a complex system with various components and connections, representing potential points of failure or blurring roles in autonomous AI systems.

outline.title: The Solution: DSP
outline.summary: Introduction to Digital Suggestion Patterns (DSP) as a standardized cognitive pipeline: Perception, Cognition, Implementation, Integration.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/9cSptIvxA6qf.png - This image illustrates a detailed pipeline with distinct stages, visually representing a 'standardized cognitive pipeline' as described in the slide.

outline.title: Why It Works
outline.summary: Benefits of the framework: reduced hallucinated agency, preserved accountability, safe scaling, and separation of vision from execution.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/g7mq3szRBOEG.jpg - This image displays various brain scans and cognitive models, which can symbolize the reduction of 'hallucinated agency' and the preservation of accountability by focusing on cognitive processes.

outline.title: What It Is Not
outline.summary: Clarifying the boundaries: not a persuasion engine, guarantee system, financial prediction model, or fully autonomous without oversight.

outline.title: Integrity & Trust
outline.summary: Technical foundations for trust: logged decisions, optional cryptographic anchoring, audit trails, and reversible execution.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/pUI2Mrdr69OA.jpg - This image clearly shows an 'AUDIT' interface with checkboxes and data, directly relating to 'Logged decisions', 'Clear audit trail', and 'Reversible execution'.

outline.title: Who Itâ€™s For
outline.summary: Target audience: AI researchers, multi-agent system builders, audit-sensitive organizations, and long-horizon autonomous projects.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/4k74SEpiLNMG.jpg - This image is titled 'Building Multi AI Agent Systems' and shows different components, making it suitable for 'AI researchers' and 'Multi-agent system builders'.

outline.title: Bottom Line
outline.summary: The core philosophy: prioritizing correctness over spectacle and scaling intelligence by limiting it.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/hSnlwjN2ZjPK.jpg - This image features a person interacting with a digital interface displaying a balance scale and various icons, which can represent the idea of prioritizing 'correctness over spectacle' and scaling intelligence by limiting it.
